Reference

All functions

OPLS_metabom8-class

An S4 class to represent an OPLS model constructed with MetaboMate

PCA_metabom8-class

An S4 class to represent an OPLS model constructed with MetaboMate

binning()

Equidistant binning of spectra

bline()

Baseline correction for 1D NMR spectra

calibrate()

Spectral calibration to a chemical shift reference (1D NMR)

cvanova() cvanova()

Cross-validated ANOVA

dmodx()

Calculating distance to the model in X space

.calibrate1d_gluc()

Calibrate 1D to glucose @ 5.233 (d)

.checkDimXY()

Check X and Y shapes (PLS context)

.checkFiles1d()

Check for intact file systems - helper function read1d

.checkXclassNas()

Check X matrix (PLS context)

.checkYclassNas()

Check for missing values (PLS context)

.check_X_ppm()

Check dimension, NA and infinity

.createDummyY()

Create dummy matrix and check numeric variable for OPLS analysis

.cvSetsMethod()

Create Cross Validation (CV) row-indices for Y

.evalFit()

Criteria to evaluate number of components

.extMeanCvFeat()

Extract data structures from output of function .oplsComponentCv

.extract_pars1d()

Read Bruker NMR paramter files - helper function read1d

.hotellingsT2()

Hotelling's T2 ellipse in 2D

.kFold()

k-fold subsets for cross validation (CV)

.kFoldStratified()

Y-stratified k-fold subsets for cross validation (CV)

.mc()

k-fold Monte Carlo Cross Validation (MCCV) subsets

.mcBalanced()

Monte Carlo Cross Validation (MCCV) generation of training sets indices

.oplsComponentCv()

Performs OPLS modelling for each CV set and collates output

.orthModelCompSummary()

Summarise component indices

.r2()

R2 and Q2

.scaleMatRcpp()

Column-wise matrix scaling

.sdMatRcpp()

Column-wise standard deviation and mean for a matrix

eruption()

Eruption plot

es_cdelta()

Cliff's delta (effect size)

get.idx()

Find indices in ppm vector for respective chemical shift range

lw()

Calculating full width at half max

matspec()

Simple plotting of multiple NMR spectra overlayed

minmax()

Min-max scaling

noise.est()

Estimation of noise level of 1D proton spectrum

opls()

Orthogonal-Partial Least Squares (O-PLS)

opls_perm()

OPLS model Y-permutations

pca()

Perform Principal Component Analysis

plot_stocsy()

Plot Statistical Total Correlation Spectroscopy (STOCSY)

plotload()

Plotting PCA or OPLS loadings

plotload_cat()

Plot PCA or O-PLS loadings

plotscores()

Plotting PCA or OPLS model scores

pqn()

Probabilistic quotient normalisation

predict_opls()

OPLS model predictions

read1d()

Read-in 1D NMR spectra

read1d_raw()

Read-in 1D NMR spectra

spec()

Simple plotting of a single NMR spectrum

specOverlay()

Higher level plotting function to overlay NMR spectra (ggplot2 based)

specload()

Overlay PCA or OPLS loadings with spectra

stocsy()

Statistical Total Correlation Spectroscopy (STOCSY)

stocsy1d_metabom8-class

An S4 class to represent STOCSY model constructed with metabom8
